June 16, 1990 D Burtonwood Brewery Brass Band Championships (Fourth Section)
Burtonwood Brewery Brass Band Championships (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Burtonwood Brewery Brass Band Championships burtonwood-brewery-brass-band-championsh-3616
None
Queen's Hall, Widnes, Cheshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £300 and trophy, 2nd £200 and trophy, 3rd £100 and trophy. Best cornet - Sale. Best horn Wardle. Best euphonium - Eccles. Best trombone - Old Hall. 10 bands competed.
Nov. 14, 2014, 10:47 a.m. Nov. 27, 2016, 8:34 p.m.
